text:
@Mike_Pence @WhiteHouse Thousands of Americans are dead because of your incompetence and willful ignorance. Rip up your pro-life card- you failed. Turn over the keys to this "task force" to legitimate epidemiologists who know what the fuck they are talking about. 
#COVID19 https://t.co/thT01HrxLL
